title: Cross-cultural music corpus: The Expanded Natural History of Song Discography
description: The Expanded Natural History of Song Discography contains more than 1000 audio recordings of vocal music gathered from many human societies, each annotated with a world region, language, and behavioural context.
citation: Mila Bertolo, Martynas Snarskis, Manvir Singh, & Samuel Mehr. (2023, August 8). Cross-cultural music corpus: The Expanded Natural History of Song Discography. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.8237500
